channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Lenovo Drivers Management

item.title: CVE-2023-25496|2023-04-28T21:13:41.817Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20drivers%20management
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Drivers Management Lenovo Driver Manager that could allow a local user to execute code with elevated privileges.
